@brucel @eleven_ty Thanks Brucey! Since you don't want to rebuild/deploy on every keypress, but more likely at a chosen moment when the editor say "publish please", I like add a button to the sheet which POSTS to an HTTP build trigger. On @Netlify you create and name them, like these on my site: https://t.co/bB2bRN3UFw
